title: A monumental gateway
review: The Buland Darwaza, can, therefore, more acceptably be attributed to Ghiyas al-din Khilji. It was not only Akbar and the Khilji Sultans who adorned Hazrat Khwaja Moinuddin Chishty ‘s tomb. By the early seventeenth century the dargah was clearly an impressive establishment with a considerable staff financed by the endowments and offerings of devotees. There was already accommodation for the staff, facilities for the pilgrims’ ritual ablutions, a monumental gateway (the Buland Darwaza), at the entrance of the shrine, and a lavishly decorated mausoleum for the saint.

title: Beautiful Architecture
review: Constructed out of red sandstone with combination of marble,this monumental gateway is splendidly carved,depicting excellent craftsmanship and finesse.This gate is one of the finest examples of islamic architecture.

title: Biggest Darwaz
review: I things Buland Darwaz is the biggest Darwaz in the India.Buland Darwaz is the historical and nice place.

title: Buland Darwaza
review: Buland Darwaza of dargah sariff 's Darwaza .this is beautiful Darwaza. Peaceful place.must see this.

title: Buland Darwaza
review: Bulan Darwaza is one of the most famous historical building of Ajmer. Its construction is good .nice place

title: Not sure what we see
review: Seeing the phote is enough, unless u r shoping near the place. Anyhow when u go to Dargh u can see this place

title: Great...
review: It is entrance gate of Dargah. It was just beautiful. It was great to see khwaja sahab dargah. Similar like buland darwaja in fatehpur sikari.

title: Gateway to Ajmer Sharif
review: Its the entrance gate to the famous Ajmer Sharif dargah. Its a strong and tall darwaza (door) serving as a monument in itself,a part of history

title: Good architecture for an entrance to shrine
review: Buland Darwaza is just an entrance to Ajmer Shariff shrine and is located in a very busy and crowded market.  One has to be extremely careful of pick-pockets and con people.

title: Not great for foreign tourists- crazy, crowded, narrow dirty streets, time has stood still for 500 years
review: Felt very uncomfortable here.

title: Cool door - con men, not maintained
review: The building itself is nice and the door interesting to see but it has not been maintained, I wouldn't go out of your way to visit.

title: Buland darwaza
review: This is biggest darwaza and I entered 10time from this darwaza in dargha sharif this is located in Rajasthan this darwaza is very old and this made in the Hijri of 786 people may go to Ajmer and visit from buland darwaza only

title: Most impressive in Dargah
review: For my taste, the entrance gate, Buland Darwaza in Dargah is, in artistic terms the most impressive in it. Buland Darvaz translates as the Gates of Splendor or the Gates of Greatness. They really stand out against the monotonous and boring design of the whole complex of buildings of Dargah. Its more famous relative is the entrance gate to Fatehpur Sikri, Akbar's city, - it reminds, but only partly. Although Akbar came to Ajmer by foot to give a large pot, presently used for langhar.

title: This is a Marvel - Standing Tall and Stout
review: Visiting this Gate was a long dream since a small kid when I read in GK book - "Tallest Gate is Buland Darwaja".

title: The entrance to the sacred
review: This is the entrance to shrine of ever merciful 'Garib Nawaz' . The attention is drawn at entrance from far - the moment you notice it it beckons you . The crowds are milling at the entrance and the security is high with metal detectors doors . The footware needs to be removed before you enter this gate . The various stalls that sell flowers ,and baskets to the faithful are too numerous . There is no entry ticket here .

title: Great
review: Main entry point of Dargha Shariff and very well decorated, the Darwaza just on main road to main city and very high

title: Part of the Main Dargah
review: The darwaza is the part of main dargah and marks your entry to the dargah. The visit to dargah will cover this

title: Buland darwaza... The gateway to the dargha.
review: Buland darwaza is the gateway to the dargha shariff which is made as a monument to muinuddin chisthi. We can reach by riskshaws around half a kilometer away from this gate. It's a bug gate well maintained with lot of architectural works making it's one of the main attractions there. After this is the dargha where you can pray, donate, offer and can visit. Altogether it's a good option for the travellers in Rajasthan.

title: The Entrance says it all
review: The Triumph of this entrance door just welcomes everyone ,Visible from very long distance. cant miss this while in ajmer

title: Gateway to Dargah Sharif
review: It is the Gateway to the holy Dargah of Khwaja Gareeb Nawaz. Most of the taxis and auto rickshaws would drop you here and then you can walk towards the Dargah.

title: Magnificant and Grand attraction
review: Its a significance that one must see to guage the grand ways of the mughal era. Its architectural marvel and makes one wonder about the intelligence and skills of the people in that era despite the limited technology available.

title: The major land Mark
review: This gate as the name suggests in local language - ' the Grand Entrance ' is a major landmark of Ajmer . The busy area here gives the local flavor of the surroundings adding to its charm . If you are one to avoid the crowds then you can hire a cycle rickshaw for a few hours for Rs .200 /- who can take you around the hub of the main areas without the hassle of braving the crowd - the best wat to savor the local scene .

title: Part of Dargah, nice one
review: this Darwaja is part of Ajmer Shariff dargah, when you enter from front side you will pass through this. nice one

title: Part of Ajmer Sharif Dhargah
review: I am not sure as to why this as been added as an additional sight seeing spot.

title: The Main Entrance to the Dargah
review: This is a beautiful arched gate leading inside the Dargah. It does give a good backdrop for taking photos at the entrance to the Dargah. The area around it is quiet crowded with lots of shops selling Chadars to be offered inside the Dargah.

title: Huge massive and brilliant
review: The original entrance point to the Dargah and you just can;t miss it as you walk on the crowded road to the dargah.

title: “The Main Entrance to The Dargah Sharif"
review: Amaging Gate. This Darwaja is Part of Ajmer Sharif  Drgah, When You Enter From Dargah Sariff You will pass through this.

title: Huge & strong Entrance of Dargah
review: This the gate from where you can enter the dargah this place is always been over crowded even at mid night

title: Nice big Door
review: This is a nice big door and is used to enter the Dargah. Its is HUGE and is nice to look at. At night it look even better

title: Needs help.
review: The gate marks the border between the pristine interior of the Dargah Sharif complex and the dirty, tout-filled streets outside. When it rained, sewage flooded the streets right up to the entrance steps. Shop keepers should take a more active role in providing a cleaner environment outside the gate. The gate itself should be returned to it's original state, removing the contemporary tiles and moving the metal detectors which are not used properly and are an eyesore.

title: Humongous Archway
review: Buland darwaza in english means big door and it really is very big. Its d main entrance to d ajmer sharif dargah. Looks vey splendid n can be seen from afar. Just like an entrance to a palace or rajas haveli. Its a sight to behold.
